DOC.brief_summary: Prevention cardiovascular event antiplatelet agent acute coronary syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Cardiovascular Events Antiplatelet Agents After Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: AReMIS ( Antiplatelet Recurrent Myocardial Infarction Study ) To compare relative risk new myocardial infarction ( recurrent myocardial infarction 'rMI ' ) patient history acute coronary syndrome ( 'ACS ' : unstable angina myocardial infarction ) , use ticagrelor , clopidogrel prasugrel ( applicable ) none treatment , aspirin consider covariate .
DOC.criteria: Patients age 18 year , gender , acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) , agree participate able respond interview French and/or provide detail alternative replier ( proxy ) necessary . No Exclusion Criteria .
